inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: scheduled by the investigators to be treated with vincristine, adriamycin and dexamethasone standard therapy

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: bone pain, bone lytic lesions, diffuse osteoporosis or pathologic fractures

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: <10.0 g/L measured by serum protein electrophoresis or immunoglobulin electrophoresis

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: < 30% by bone marrow aspirate and/or biopsy

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: > 2 X the upper limit of normal (ULN)

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: no MI within 6 months of enrollment, NYHA Class I heart failure

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and will be treated with Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy.
